name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thich Nhat Hanh New Tab Page

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome new tab chrome extension that shows pretty colors and deep quotes from Thich Nhat Hanh.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gives you a chance to take a moment and ground yourself every time you open a new tab.

Includes:
* 25+ Colorful backgrounds.
* 130+ Thich Nhat Hanh.
* Discretely hides quotes until you hover over them.
